newsitem.title: USA: TI says semiconductor oper profits improved.
newsitem.headline: TI says semiconductor oper profits improved.

text.p: Texas Instruments Inc said fourth quarter operating profits at its semiconductor business showed significant improvement over the third quarter but its memory business continued to show a loss.
The company said overall revenues for its semiconductor business were higher than in its third quarter.
However, it said revenues remained down from year-ago levels due primarily to low Dynamic Random Access Memory (DRAM) prices.
TI said its memory business, while improved, continued to operate at a loss due to the lower prices and a high level of fixed investment.
Semiconductor orders were up solidly versus the third quarter, it said, but also remained below year-ago levels.
